unnormalised: I remember when my friend Priya, studying at IIT Delhi, was feeling overwhelmed. She started using a mental health app after watching "Dear Zindagi." It helped her track her moods and find some inner peace amidst the exam stress. Apps can be a good first step, like a chai break for the mind, but if things get tough, consulting a professional is key.
